name: R5-List-R4-List
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R5 List into FHIR R4

element.display: A list is a curated collection of resources

target.display: A list is a curated collection of resources
target.comment: R5 `List` maps as Equivalent to R4 `List`

element.display: What the purpose of this list is

target.display: What the purpose of this list is
target.comment: R5 `List.code` maps as Equivalent to R4 `List.code`
R5 `List.contained` maps as Equivalent to R4 `List.contained`
R5 `List.date` maps as Equivalent to R4 `List.date`
R5 `List.emptyReason` maps as Equivalent to R4 `List.emptyReason`
R5 `List.encounter` maps as Equivalent to R4 `List.encounter`
R5 `List.entry` maps as Equivalent to R4 `List.entry`
R5 `List.entry.date` maps as Equivalent to R4 `List.entry.date`

element.display: If this item is actually marked as deleted

target.display: If this item is actually marked as deleted
target.comment: R5 `List.entry.deleted` maps as Equivalent to R4 `List.entry.deleted`

R5 `List.entry.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `List.entry.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `extension`
R5 `List.entry.flag` maps as Equivalent to R4 `List.entry.flag`
R5 `List.entry.id` maps as Equivalent to R4 `List.entry.id`
R5 `List.entry.item` maps as Equivalent to R4 `List.entry.item`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R5 `List.entry.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `List.entry.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `modifierExtension`
R5 `List.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `List.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `extension`
R5 `List.id` maps as Equivalent to R4 `List.id`
R5 `List.identifier` maps as Equivalent to R4 `List.identifier`

element.display: A set of rules under which this content was created

target.display: A set of rules under which this content was created
target.comment: R5 `List.implicitRules` maps as Equivalent to R4 `List.implicitRules`
R5 `List.language` maps as RelatedTo to R4 `List.language` - language changed the binding strength from Required to Preferred
R5 `List.meta` maps as Equivalent to R4 `List.meta`

R5 `List.mode` maps as Equivalent to R4 `List.mode` - mode has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/list-mode|5.0.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/list-mode|4.0.1 (Equivalent)

R5 `List.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `List.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `modifierExtension`
R5 `List.note` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `List.note` - note has change due to type change: R5 `note` `Annotation` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `note`
R5 `List.orderedBy` maps as Equivalent to R4 `List.orderedBy`

element.display: Who and/or what defined the list contents (aka Author)

target.display: Who and/or what defined the list contents (aka Author)
target.comment: R5 `List.source` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `List.source` - source has change due to type change: R5 `source` `Reference` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `source`

R5 `List.status` maps as Equivalent to R4 `List.status` - status has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/list-status|5.0.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/list-status|4.0.1 (Equivalent)

element.display: If all resources have the same subject(s)

target.display: If all resources have the same subject
target.comment: R5 `List.subject` maps as RelatedTo to R4 `List.subject` - subject changed from array to scalar (max cardinality from * to 1); subject has change due to type change: R5 `subject` `Reference` maps as RelatedTo for R4 `subject`

element.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation

target.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation
target.comment: R5 `List.text` maps as Equivalent to R4 `List.text`
R5 `List.title` maps as Equivalent to R4 `List.title`
